description:
The Goryoukan Academy for Girls. This school has a secret. Girls are scouted and added to the Special-Ops Unit called Fifth Force, an organization dedicated to fighting the O`bli. Four girls, Satoka, Io, Yuumi, and Mana, are investigating a rumor at the school to find a ghost, but Altair Torte, a new team within Fifth Force, is called to action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出撃! フィフス・フォース
